subject: Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ Mathias Kiwanuka has decided to end his riding days in the wake of a motorcycle accident that seriously injured his older brother about 10 days ago in Indianapolis.
snippet: The Giants’ Mathias Kiwanuka has decided to end his riding days in the wake of a motorcycle accident that seriously injured his older brother about 10 days ago in Indianapolis.
